featured.text: This is a report about John Glenn after he (A) successfully accomplished his 1962 Mercury flight.
Glenn’s first ticker-tape parade on March 1, 1962, after his Mercury flight, is considered the largest ever in New York.

definition.zh_def: 水銀，一種化學元素，符號為Hg，常用於溫度計和其他儀器中。
definition.en_def: Mercury, a chemical element with the symbol Hg, commonly used in thermometers and other instruments.
definition.example: The thermometer contains mercury to measure temperature accurately.
